summary.description:
Located in the heart of HSR Layout, this rare architectural masterpiece redefines ultra-luxury living in Bangalore. Designed for those who value exclusivity, Purva Meraki blends refined aesthetics, world-class amenities, and a sense of quiet prestige?creating homes that are as sophisticated as they are timeless.

With seamless connectivity to Outer Ring Road, Electronic City, and Koramangala, residents enjoy effortless access to Bengaluru?s prime business and lifestyle hubs, while remaining cocooned in a serene, upscale neighbourhood. Surrounded by lush parks, elite social destinations, and premium commercial centres, Purva Meraki offers the perfect balance of urban dynamism and tranquil living.

More than a residence, Purva Meraki is a statement?where heritage elegance meets contemporary luxury, crafted for those who settle for nothing but the exceptional.

aboutBuilder.description: Puravankara Limited, headquartered in Bengaluru, is one of India?s most admired and trusted home builders and is recognized among the top real estate companies in India, with a legacy of excellence spanning over 50 years. Founded in 1975, the company is known for delivering high-quality homes on time with complete transparency.
aboutBuilder.descriptionExpanded: Puravankara has launched three prominent brands, each catering to distinct market segments. Puravankara itself is recognized for its luxurious, state-of-the-art projects that incorporate innovative technology to redefine future homes. Provident Housing Ltd., a wholly-owned subsidiary launched in 2008, addresses the needs of mid-income homeowners. Purva Land, established in 2021, offers a lucrative investment opportunity through plotted developments, responding to the evolving needs of homebuyers. Additionally, Starworth Infrastructure and Construction Limited (SICL) provides technology-enabled construction solutions. Puravankara also has a strong presence in commercial office spaces.

faqs.title: Where is Purva Meraki located?
items: Purva Meraki is located in the heart of HSR Layout, Bangalore, one of the city?s most prestigious residential neighbourhoods, known for its calm environment and elite social infrastructure.

faqs.title: What type of homes are available at Purva Meraki?
items: Purva Meraki offers ultra-luxury 3 BHK apartments, designed for buyers seeking expansive living spaces, privacy, and refined architectural detailing.

faqs.title: How exclusive is Purva Meraki?
items: Purva Meraki is an extremely low-density development with only 44 exclusive residences, ensuring privacy, quiet living, and a rare sense of exclusivity.

faqs.title: How many towers and floors does Purva Meraki have?
items: The project features a single iconic tower with 2 basements + ground + 8 floors, reinforcing its boutique, private character.

faqs.title: What makes Purva Meraki different from other luxury projects in Bangalore?
items: Purva Meraki stands out for its limited inventory, large private balconies, refined material palette (brick, glass, wood), and a design philosophy focused on understated luxury rather than high-density living.

faqs.title: Who is the developer of Purva Meraki?
items: Purva Meraki is developed by Puravankara Limited, a renowned real estate brand with over five decades of experience in premium and luxury housing.

faqs.title: Is Purva Meraki suitable for senior professionals and business owners?
items: Yes. Purva Meraki is ideal for CXOs, entrepreneurs, business owners, and senior professionals who value privacy, prestige, and proximity to key business districts.

faqs.title: What kind of amenities does Purva Meraki offer?
items: Amenities are thoughtfully curated for luxury living and include landscaped greens, wellness and fitness spaces, exclusive resident areas, and premium lifestyle facilities designed for a refined audience.

faqs.title: What is the price range of apartments at Purva Meraki?
items: Ultra-luxury residences at Purva Meraki are priced from ?3.90 Cr onwards*, depending on configuration, floor level, and unit size.

faqs.title: Is Purva Meraki a good long-term investment?
items: Yes. With its rare low-density format, prime HSR Layout location, and limited supply of ultra-luxury homes, Purva Meraki offers strong long-term value preservation and appreciation potential.

faqs.title: Does Purva Meraki have rental potential?
items: Yes. Luxury homes in HSR Layout attract senior executives, founders, and expat tenants, supporting high-value rentals with low vacancy risk.

faqs.title: Is Purva Meraki RERA approved?
items: Yes. Purva Meraki is RERA registered, ensuring full legal compliance, transparency, and buyer protection as per regulations.

faqs.title: Are these homes better suited for end users or investors?
items: Primarily end users seeking exclusivity, privacy, and prestige. However, investors also benefit from limited inventory, premium tenant demand, and long-term capital appreciation.

faqs.title: How can I get detailed pricing or arrange a private site visit?
items: You can request a private, appointment-based site visit, receive detailed pricing, floor plans, and personalised assistance through PropYouLike.
